dc_description_s: Relief shown by shading.; Shows roads and locations of animals.; "Shikar information by R.C. Hanson, Survey of India."; "Atlas sheets utilized by kind permission of Col E.A. Tandy, R.E., Surveyor General of India."; "Heliozincographed at the Survey of India Offices, Calcutta."; At bottom left: "Reg. No. 1313 E.25--220."; Text and advertisements on verso.; Date from previous call number stamped on map.|67 x 78 centimeters|Scale 1:253,440; 1 inch = 4 miles.
